author: jplevyak
msg: TS-82: remove/fix unimplemented event processor interfaces
remove the EventProcessor::schedule interfaces which take a thread argument
which are not implemented, implement the callback_event which
for some reason was being ignored.  Also, add the operators to MutexLock
to match those of a MutexTryLock.

author: woonsan
msg: JS2-1084: fixing the problem that portlet is not removed in FF.
In FF 3.0.xx, the css ID selector does not work properly with ID containing '.'.
A workaround is to use css attribute selector.
For example, Y.Node.one("#my.id") can be replaced by Y.Node.one("[id='my.id']").
